extension.name: Redirect to Edit Profile
extension.author: Team Joomlaxi
extension.description: This extension will redirect user to edit profile page when Required field(mandatory fields)of JomSocial are empty. Administrator can be forced to complete user-profile before user goes anywhere else. Or admin can redirect him once on login. This plugin can also check for Not-Required field, if mentioned in backend.

field.name: whenredirect
field.label: When to redirect user
field.description: Select 'Just After login' when you want to redirect only after login else select 'Everytime'.

field.name: whichfield
field.label: For which fields
field.description: Select 'All' if you want to check completness of all field else select 'Only required filed' if you want that only required field should complete.

field.name: message
field.label: Write message
field.description: Write Message here to display when user is redirected forcefully to edit profile page
